question_text: After the fall of the Consensus Hydra, Zero discovers realities where changes appeared valid and consistent, yet were authored by entities that should never have had influence. Identify such realities.
question_answer: SELECT DISTINCT r.id FROM realities r JOIN updates u ON r.id = u.reality_id JOIN actor_roles ar ON u.actor_id = ar.actor_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON ar.role_id = rp.role_id WHERE rp.can_modify = false;

question_text: Pixel finds identities accessing records that were never meant to be visible to them, yet no alarms were raised. The access path appears legitimate. Identify such silent visibility breaches.
question_answer: SELECT DISTINCT rd.read_id FROM read_logs rd JOIN actor_roles ar ON rd.actor_id = ar.actor_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON ar.role_id = rp.role_id WHERE rp.can_read = false;

question_text: Nyx suspects that some rows were selectively altered while the surrounding data remained untouched, making the change hard to detect. Identify updates that modified only sensitive fields.
question_answer: SELECT u.update_id FROM updates u JOIN update_steps us ON u.update_id = us.update_id JOIN fields f ON us.field_id = f.field_id GROUP BY u.update_id HAVING COUNT(*) = COUNT(CASE WHEN f.is_sensitive = true THEN 1 END);

question_text: Zero uncovers realities where historical records were subtly rewritten, yet global consistency checks passed. Identify realities where history differs across replicas but converged later.
question_answer: SELECT DISTINCT r.id FROM realities r JOIN replica_history rh ON r.id = rh.reality_id GROUP BY r.id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT rh.state_hash) > 1;

question_text: Pixel detects trusted components that introduced corrupted data into multiple realities simultaneously. These components never directly changed data themselves. Identify such indirect sources.
question_answer: SELECT DISTINCT sc.component_id FROM supply_chain_logs sc JOIN updates u ON sc.component_id = u.source_component GROUP BY sc.component_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT u.reality_id) > 3;

question_text: Nyx notices that some changes passed every validation rule yet caused downstream systems to behave unpredictably. The issue traces back to training data corruption. Identify such poisoned inputs.
question_hint: Correct data can still be wrong.
question_answer: SELECT DISTINCT d.dataset_id FROM datasets d JOIN model_inputs mi ON d.dataset_id = mi.dataset_id JOIN updates u ON mi.update_id = u.update_id WHERE d.is_trusted = true AND mi.outlier_score > 0.95;

question_text: Zero finds that some actors accumulated influence gradually, never triggering alarms, until they effectively controlled entire realities. Identify such privilege accumulation paths.
question_answer: SELECT ar.actor_id FROM actor_roles ar GROUP BY ar.actor_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT ar.role_id) > 5;

question_text: Pixel suspects that some audit trails look complete but were constructed after the fact. Identify updates whose audit records were written later than expected.
question_answer: SELECT u.update_id FROM updates u JOIN audit_logs a ON u.update_id = a.update_id WHERE a.logged_time > u.end_time + INTERVAL '5 minutes';

question_text: Nyx detects realities where isolation and consensus held, yet outcomes were biased by manipulated inputs rather than faulty coordination. Identify such realities.
question_answer: SELECT DISTINCT r.id FROM realities r JOIN updates u ON r.id = u.reality_id JOIN model_outputs mo ON u.update_id = mo.update_id WHERE mo.bias_score > 0.9;

question_text: Zero prepares a covert integrity sweep: identify realities where access misuse, subtle data alteration, and delayed auditing all occurred together.
question_answer: SELECT DISTINCT r.id FROM realities r JOIN updates u ON r.id = u.reality_id JOIN actor_roles ar ON u.actor_id = ar.actor_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON ar.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN audit_logs a ON u.update_id = a.update_id WHERE rp.can_modify = false AND a.logged_time > u.end_time + INTERVAL '5 minutes';

question_text: BOSS FIGHT: The Trust Eater corrupts reality not by breaking rules, but by exploiting them. Zero must isolate realities where unauthorized influence, poisoned inputs, delayed audits, and replica divergence all overlap.
question_answer: SELECT DISTINCT r.id FROM realities r JOIN updates u ON r.id = u.reality_id JOIN actor_roles ar ON u.actor_id = ar.actor_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON ar.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN model_outputs mo ON u.update_id = mo.update_id JOIN replica_history rh ON r.id = rh.reality_id JOIN audit_logs a ON u.update_id = a.update_id WHERE rp.can_modify = false AND mo.bias_score > 0.9 AND a.logged_time > u.end_time + INTERVAL '5 minutes' GROUP BY r.id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT rh.state_hash) > 1;

question_text: FINAL BOSS: The Invisible Adversary bends reality without breaking any guarantees. Zero must identify realities where privilege accumulation, supply-chain poisoning, biased decision models, forged audits, and delayed detection combined to permanently alter outcomes.
question_hint: This is the limit of trust.
question_answer: SELECT DISTINCT r.id FROM realities r JOIN updates u ON r.id = u.reality_id JOIN actor_roles ar ON u.actor_id = ar.actor_id JOIN supply_chain_logs sc ON u.source_component = sc.component_id JOIN model_outputs mo ON u.update_id = mo.update_id JOIN audit_logs a ON u.update_id = a.update_id WHERE mo.bias_score > 0.9 AND a.logged_time > u.end_time + INTERVAL '5 minutes' GROUP BY r.id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT ar.role_id) > 5;
